nodes.text: An entertainer was a person who performed in front of audiences for money. It was a general term that could be applied to singers, dancers, musicians and acrobats. One famous band was Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes. For some species, entertaining was a way of life. One well known species who considered this were the Twi'lek. Bith were known to play musical instruments, and were known as some of the best musicians in the galaxy (Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes were Bith).
